Sequence Information.Peptide Name: aurein 1.2 F13W (peptide B1, Synthetic AMPs, variant of aurein 1.2, XXA, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, amphibians, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is poorly similar (92.31%) toAurein 1.1.Activity: inhibited Human Immunodeficiency Virus Type 1 HIV-1 (EC50 11.7 uM).Toxicity: TC50 37 uM in CEM-SS cells.Updated 12/2024
Literature Information.Author: Wang G, Watson KM, Peterkofsky A, Buckheit RW Jr. 2010
Literature Information.Title: Identification of novel human immunodeficiency virus type 1-inhibitory peptides based on the antimicrobial peptide database
